VIII.iv.6.C.1.f
.
Notice of Favorable Resolutions
In any case that is resolved in favor of the Veteran, the District Counsel is responsible for providing the results of the tort claim to the Veterans Service Center Manager (VSCM) of the regional office (RO) having jurisdiction of the claims folder.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section C - Authorization of Awards Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section C
